member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError
member.summary: Specifies the possible errors that can appear during the rendering of a PDF page.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.CmykJpeg
member.summary: CMYK JPEG image is rendered as negative.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.Jpeg2000
member.summary: JPEG2000 image is not rendered.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.JBig2
member.summary: JBIG2 image is not rendered.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.InvalidFontData
member.summary: Font cannot be rendered.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.TextClipPath
member.summary: Text used as clipping path.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PDFPageRenderingError.ContentStreamError
member.summary: Content stream cannot be processed.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.FontParserException
member.summary: Defines the exception thrown when errors are encountered when parsing the font files.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.InvalidPageException
member.summary: Defines the exception thrown when the page object is not valid.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.InvalidPasswordException
member.summary: Defines the exception thrown when the password for opening the PDF file is not valid.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Exceptions.PageRenderingException
member.summary: Defines the exception thrown when errors are encountered in the page content.

Inner exception.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PageScaling
member.summary: Specifies the available scaling options when printing a PDF file.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PageScaling.None
member.summary: No page scaling is performed. The page content is displayed starting from the top left corner of the page. Content that falls outside the printable are is not printed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PageScaling.FitToPrinterMargins
member.summary: Page content is scaled, enlarged or reduced, to fit the printable area. The original aspect ratio is not preserved.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PageScaling.FitToPrinterMarginsProportional
member.summary: Page content is scaled, enlarged or reduced, to fit the printable area. The original aspect ratio is preserved.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PageScaling.ReduceToPrinterMargins
member.summary: Page content is scaled (reduced) to fit the printable area if it is larger than the printable area. If it is smaller, no scaling is performed. The original aspect ratio is not preserved if one of the dimensions, width and/or height, needs to be scaled.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PageScaling.ReduceToPrinterMarginsProportional
member.summary: Page content is scaled (reduced) to fit the printable area if it is larger than the printable area. If it is smaller, no scaling is performed. The original aspect ratio is preserved if one of the dimensions, width and/or height, needs to be scaled.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PageScaling.MultiplePagesPerSheet
member.summary: Multiple pages are printed on a single sheet of paper.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PageScaling.MultiplePagesPerSheetProportional
member.summary: Multiple pages are printed on a single sheet of paper. The original aspect ratio is preserved for each page.

member.name: T:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintContent
member.summary: Specifies what parts of the page (content, annotations and/or form fields) should be printed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintContent.Page
member.summary: Page content should be printed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintContent.Annotations
member.summary: Annotations should be printed.

member.name: F:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintContent.FormFields
member.summary: Form fields should be printed.

member.summary: Defines the arguments for print progress event.

member.summary: Gets or sets the bitmap resolution for printing.

member.summary: Gets or sets the columns count.
member.exception: Thrown when values is less than 1.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintSettings.DocumentName
member.summary: Gets or sets the document name to display (for example, in a print status dialog box or printer queue) while printing the document.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintSettings.DownscaleLargeImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether large images should be down scaled.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintSettings.PageScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets the page scaling.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintSettings.PrintQueue
member.summary: Gets the print queue.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintSettings.PrintRanges
member.summary: Gets or sets the ranges of pages to print.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PDFPrintSettings.Rows
member.summary: Gets or sets the rows count.
member.exception: Thrown when values is less than 1.

member.summary: Initializes a new object.

The number of the page within the printed range being printed.
Total number of pages being printed.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page printing should be cancelled or not.

member.summary: Gets the page number within the print range being printed.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PrintProgressEventArgs.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets the page number within the document being printed.

member.name: P:O2S.Components.PDFRender4NET.Printing.PrintProgressEventArgs.PrintPageCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages being printed.
